title: Can't start a discussion in Client Discussion as it says I need to be level 12
body: I'm level 23 and can post in every other discussion but Client Discussion?

replies.body: It looks like the minimum requirement is level 12 to post there, so everything looks fine.  It's likely that your account wasn't sync'd to the boards, but your post here should have made that update.  Let me know if this is still an issue!
Thanks for the response! Just checked now and all seems to be in order! Guess this post did sync my account, thanks again for the help!
